words.ex: They maintained a xenial atmosphere for all international guests.
The geologist examined a xenolith embedded in the volcanic rock.
The policy was criticized for encouraging xenophobia.
As a xenophile, she eagerly embraced foreign traditions.
The novel explored xenogenesis as a metaphor for radical change.
Only xeric plants could survive the region’s harsh climate.
The desert is home to numerous resilient xerophytes.
The child played a simple melody on the xylophone.
Xylophagous insects caused extensive damage to the old beams.
